alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Line Of Thunderstorms From Anderson to Salcha... A line of strong thunderstorms passed south through Fairbanks and North Pole between 4 PM and 5 PM, and then continued south. At 545 PM the line of thunderstorms lies from Anderson to Salcha. The thunderstorms have frequent lightning, heavy rain, hail up to 3/4 of an inch in diameter and winds gusting to 30 mph. The thunderstorms will continue to move south towards Delta Junction and Healy between 6 and 7 pm. Thunderstorms should start to weaken after 7 pm. Scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms continue over the Fairbanks, North Pole and Eielson areas and areas north of Fairbanks. These storms will be weaker than what came through earlier, and will last through 9 or 10 pm.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
